computeNumericalGradient¶

computeNumericalGradient.computeNumericalGradient(J, theta)[source]¶

Compute numgrad = computeNumericalGradient(J, theta)

Parameters:
  • theta – a vector of parameters
  • J – a function that outputs a real-number and the gradient.
Returns:

1d array of numerical gradient of given cost function. numgrad[i] = del J/ del_theta[i]
Return type:

numgrad

Where, epsilon = 0.0001.

Previous topic

checkNumericalGradient

Next topic

softmax
